front.title: HTTP Authentication: SPNEGO Access Authentication As implemented in Microsoft Windows 2000

abstract.t: This document describes how the Microsoft Internet Explorer (MSIE) and Internet Information Services (IIS) incorporated in Microsoft Windows 2000 use Kerberos for security enhancements of web transactions. The HTTP auth-scheme of 'negotiate' is defined here; when the negotiation results in the selection of Kerberos, the security services of authentication and optionally impersonation are performed. This document explains how HTTP authentication utilizes the SPNEGO [7] GSSAPI mechanism. Details of SPNEGO implementation are not provided in this document.
